channel.title: Whats the hail command
channel.description: can u tell me the command in full method or emote. ty

item.title: Whats the hail command
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“HiddenPker, post:12, topic:283055”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=374033.msg2821263#msg2821263 date=1244614624]
Something like

if(command.startsWith("hail") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mod Gamer")) { hail();

And I also have…

public void hail() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) { client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client castOn.plrText = "ALL HAIL "+playerName+"!"; castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY); castOn.setAnimation(1651); castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
[/quote]

Dont do it when I already have. No point.[/quote]
The post you made tells him to call a nonexistent method, which would cause errors.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats the hail command

item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Something like

if(command.startsWith("hail") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mod Gamer")) { hail();

And I also have…

public void hail() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) { client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client castOn.plrText = "ALL HAIL "+playerName+"!"; castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY); castOn.setAnimation(1651); castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

item.title: Whats the hail command
item.dc:creator: @HiddenPker HiddenPker
item.description:
@HiddenPker wrote:

dood if its delta then use this

if(command.startsWith("hail") && playerRights > 2){ hail(); }
and to change the text when you hail replace this

castOn.plrText = "ALL HAIL "+playerName+"!";

btw to find this above ^ just do ctrl and F
then search for w.e it says when ya hail.

Hope it helps.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats the hail command
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“lildude783, post:3, topic:283055”]hmm… i think MAYBE… ppl shouldnt be allowed to post if it isnt over 4 words in a post?

in that case… jc… urs would STILL make it over Use = 1 , the = 2 , search = 3, bar = 4, . = 5 lol

either way… u have to make a

public void hail();

and fill in that code… then make the command ::hail … and i can tell u the hail command… but ur gonna need to find the public void hail

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("hail") && playerRights == 3) { sendMessage("they bow down to u!!!"); hail() }

I COULD BE WRONG!!! … lol if i am lemme know :P[/quote]
Well, it would be -

public void hail() { // Name of method. // Do stuff. } // Closing the code.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("hail") && playerRights > 2) { // Requirements. hail(); // Calling the method. } // Closing the code.

Read full topic
